# Data Sistah Website

This is a professional website for Data Sistah, an AI Development & Consulting company.

## Project Information

- **Technology**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (vanilla, no framework)
- **Design**: Modern, professional, responsive
- **Color Scheme**: Gradient purple/blue theme (#667eea to #764ba2)
- **Focus**: AI development and consulting services

## Key Points

- All information about Data Sistah services must be accurate and match the provided business description
- Maintain professional tone and clean design
- Services include: AI Development, LLM Integration, and AI Consulting
- Led by Tiffany Teasley, a data scientist and AI developer
- Focus on practical, responsible AI development

## Coding Standards

- Keep code clean and well-commented
- Maintain responsive design for all screen sizes
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow accessibility best practices
- Keep styles organized and maintainable
